function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Facial recognition technology used to track individuals infected with COVID-19","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures, obtain consent from individuals","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption, anonymization techniques","People":"General public, individuals with COVID-19","Owner":"Government, technology companies"},{"Description":"Bio-surveillance facial recognition system monitoring social distancing and mask-wearing adherence","Impact":"Loss of privacy, potential misuse of data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures, obtain consent from individuals","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, image processing, facial recognition","People":"General public","Owner":"Technology companies, government"},{"Description":"Employment of engineering techniques to reduce the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Dependence on technology, potential for technological failures","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of technology, training for system operators","Technologies":"UV radiation, infrared thermal imaging, robotics, AFR technologies","People":"General public","Owner":"Healthcare, transportation, surveillance, and delivery systems"}]}
